imdb.title: Yakitate!! Japan
imdb.plot: Azuma Kazuma isn't terribly clever, but he's got a good heart and great skill - at baking. Since childhood, he's been on a quest to create the perfect bread to represent Japan internationally. Now, he seeks to enter the famous bak...

episodes.title: Hi hîn!! Umai pan wo tsukure!

episodes.title: Makehen!! Ôsakapan de shôbuya!
episodes.plot: The newcomers are still working on their bread for the competition; Kawachi is in intense training to bulk up, and Azuma faints on his way to Izu, but finds what he needs at a sushi restaurant that he collapses near-wasabi.

episodes.title: Kazuma shikkaku!? Kishikaisei no urutora C!
episodes.plot: Kazuma is re-admitted into the Newcomers' battle after Kuroyanagi tastes his butter rolls. When he meets Mizuno Azusagawa, Tsukino's bratty younger sister, they make a bet. If he loses, he will have to transfer to her new Tokyo Pantasia branch.

episodes.title: Saikyô chiîmu! Onono Komachi san de katsunja!!
episodes.plot: Feeling totally hopeless, Azuma becomes depressed, while Kawachi goes on to win his match. The day of the match between Azuma and Shachihoko has arrived and Azuma prepares an okonomiyaki-style sandwich on panini bread. But will it win him the match?

episodes.title: Nan'yate!! Kawachi, otoko no môtokkun!
episodes.plot: The villainous Yukino destroys Kanmuri's lab after he loses to Kazuma.

episodes.title: Tsuigeki!! Burakkujapan tanjô!
episodes.plot: Yukino hires three men from the St. Pierre Kyushu branch with the ability to replicate bread recipes. He tricks the men into making the special diet bread sold by Pantasia. Hearing St. Pierre's plan, Pantasia combat it with their special "Black Japan".

episodes.title: VIP seki de saikai!! Hebun agein!
episodes.plot: Pierrot is revealed to have "Bombay blood", and is on the verge of dying. The King of Monaco reveals he also has "Bombay blood" and goes to rescue Pierrot, where he pulls out all the stops to save Pierrot's life.

episodes.title: Ai wa seito mo sukuu!! Taiyô no te vs Honô no ude!
episodes.plot: After CMAP finishes their mango curry bread and serves it up for Kuroyanagi, a helicopter shows up with the CMAP team's "Goddess of Victory": a Malaysian tapir. Kuroyanagi praises the CMAP team's mango curry bread, until Azuma serves him his "Saito Ja-pan": Mango Waffle Haniwa.

episodes.title: Nin nin nin!! Ore no nindô dattebayo!

episodes.title: Kanmuri no himitsu!! Jingi naki jamu taiketsu!
episodes.plot: When a platoon of limousines full of Yakuza pulls up in front of Pantasia, both brothers make a bet that whoever loses the next match will abandon their culinary dreams and take over the syndicate.

episodes.title: Kiseki no mushipan!! Panda ga panda ni natta hi!
episodes.plot: Panda's bread explodes... three times! How can this possibly be? Has Mokoyama made the bread he's always dreamed of making?

episodes.title: Taiyô vs Fubuki!! Kyûkyoku no taruto taiketsu!
episodes.plot: Tsukino's sister steps in to challenge Kazuma and the others in the semi-finals, in a match she is well-suited for: making tarts.
